verbs.description: [ARG1: atlanta gang member] [V: sentenced] [ARGM-LOC: in 2002 gwinnett drive - by shooting] an atlanta man has been sentenced to more than six years in prison for his involvement in the 2002 fatal drive - by shooting of a rival gang member in gwinnett county the u s department of justice said julio gwinnett county murder united states department of justice buford highway ramos gang dad racketeering atlanta vallejo plaza fiesta aldo vallejo justice department brownside locos gwinnett county georgia
